ctx: intros y x z H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type R : relation X y, x, z : X H1 : star R x y H2 : plus R y z Unable to unify "star R x y" with "plus R x y".

ctx: intros y x z H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros y x z H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros y x z H1 H2. apply plus_star_plus with y. - apply H1. - apply star_trans with y. + apply star_sind with X R (fun x y => plus R x y). * intros. apply plus_star. * intros. apply plus_star_plus with y. ++ auto. ++ apply star1. auto. * apply y. * apply H1. * apply plus_star. auto. + auto.
